title: Spaghetti Carbonara
instruction:
1. Boil spaghetti until al dente.
2. Cook pancetta in a pan.
3. Mix eggs and parmesan.
4. Combine spaghetti with pancetta and egg mixture.
5. Season with black pepper.

title: Chicken Tikka Masala
instruction:
1. Marinate chicken in yogurt and spices.
2. Grill chicken until cooked.
3. Prepare tomato-based sauce with cream.
4. Combine chicken with sauce.
5. Serve with rice or naan.

title: Beef Stir Fry
instruction:
1. Slice beef thinly.
2. Stir fry beef with garlic and soy sauce.
3. Add vegetables (bell peppers, broccoli).
4. Cook until vegetables are tender.
5. Serve with steamed rice.

title: Vegetable Pad Thai
instruction:
1. Soak rice noodles.
2. Stir fry tofu and vegetables.
3. Add noodles and pad thai sauce.
4. Mix well and garnish with peanuts and lime.

title: Margherita Pizza
instruction:
1. Prepare pizza dough.
2. Spread tomato sauce.
3. Add mozzarella and basil.
4. Bake at 220°C for 12–15 mins.
5. Drizzle with olive oil and serve.

title: Chocolate Brownies
instruction:
1. Preheat oven to 180°C.
2. Mix melted chocolate, butter, sugar, and eggs.
3. Fold in flour.
4. Pour into baking tray.
5. Bake 25–30 mins and cool.

title: Grilled Salmon
instruction:
1. Season salmon with salt, pepper, and lemon.
2. Grill 5–7 mins per side.
3. Serve with steamed vegetables and rice.

title: Caesar Salad
instruction:
1. Chop romaine lettuce.
2. Add croutons and parmesan.
3. Toss with Caesar dressing.
4. Serve chilled.

title: Shrimp Fried Rice
instruction:
1. Cook rice and let cool.
2. Stir fry shrimp with garlic.
3. Add vegetables and rice.
4. Season with soy sauce.
5. Serve hot.

title: Tom Yum Soup
instruction:
1. Boil chicken stock.
2. Add lemongrass, lime leaves, galangal.
3. Add shrimp and mushrooms.
4. Season with lime juice, fish sauce, and chili.
5. Serve hot.

title: Pancakes
instruction:
1. Mix flour, milk, eggs, and sugar.
2. Heat pan and pour batter.
3. Cook until golden on both sides.
4. Serve with syrup and fruits.

title: Lasagna
instruction:
1. Prepare meat sauce.
2. Boil lasagna noodles.
3. Layer noodles, sauce, and cheese.
4. Bake at 180°C for 45 mins.
5. Let cool and serve.
